snippet: Gov. Mike Beebe vetoed legislation on Monday that would have banned abortions 12 weeks into a pregnancy if a fetal heartbeat was detected using an abdominal ultrasound.
abstract: Arkansas Gov Mike Beebe vetoes legislation that would have banned abortions 12 weeks into pregnancy if fetal heartbeat was detected using abdominal ultrasound.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mike Beebe vetoed legislation on Monday that would have banned abortions 12 weeks into a pregnancy if a fetal heartbeat was detected using an abdominal ultrasound.

headline.seo: Arkansas: Governor Vetoes New Abortion Restriction
headline.main: Arkansas: Governor Vetoes New Abortion Restriction
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Governor Vetoes New Abortion Restriction
